name: Aabshar
description: Aabshar is an impact-driven startup focused on addressing global water scarcity and high utility costs through innovative, AI-driven technology. Our patent-pending solution saves up to 98% of water usage, reduces utility expenses by up to 60%, and cuts CO2 emissions significantly. We empower homes, industries, and community centers, particularly in water-stressed regions, by providing real-time data and actionable insights to manage resources efficiently.
one_liner: Aabshar is an impact-driven startup focused on addressing global water scarcity and high utility costs through innovative, AI-driven technology. Our patent-pending solution saves up to 98% of water usage, reduces utility expenses by up to 60%, and cuts CO2 emissions significantly. We empower homes, industries, and community centers, particularly in water-stressed regions, by providing real-time data and actionable insights to manage resources efficiently.
